reg_info.full_title: R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 808: DESIGNATION OF FACILITIES UNDER DEVELOPMENTAL SERVICES ACT
reg_info.reg_name_text: DESIGNATION OF FACILITIES UNDER DEVELOPMENTAL SERVICES ACT
reg_info.act_under: Municipal Act, 2001   Loi de 2001 sur les municipalités

content.content:
